snippet: An assault on Mitt Romney's record at Bain Capital takes his central rationale as a candidate and turns it into a bludgeoning tool.
abstract: An assault on Mitt Romney's record at Bain Capital takes his central rationale as a candidate and turns it into a bludgeoning tool.
lead_paragraph: You've tried shredding his record, mocking his ideology, assailing his truthfulness. It's come to not very much. So if you're Newt Gingrich or Rick Santorum or Jon Huntsman or Ron Paul, how, exactly, do you stop Mitt Romney?

headline.main: Why Bain Attacks Could Stick to Romney
